channel.title: Pvp
channel.description:
What would the code be for this? Also this is a 317 PI.
if player is in these coords (1000, 1200, 700, 300), then playerWildlevel +1.
then
if playerWildlevel = 1 { isInWild }
etc, i just thought this would be an easier way for adding pvp since my server is effed.
